meanings.sent1: She is the sveltest dancer in the group.
meanings.sent2: The model showcased the sveltest dress on the runway.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to imitate the sveltest moves of the ballerina.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as sveltest as a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The sveltest branches of the willow tree swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Most slender or graceful in figure.
meanings.sent1: The gazelle was the sveltest animal in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: Her fingers were the sveltest as she played the piano.
meanings.sent3: The sveltest vase on the shelf wobbled precariously.
meanings.sent4: The sveltest of all the flowers, the orchid stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sveltest of all the birds, the hummingbird darted swiftly from flower to flower.
